posts.subject: Clone 8chan is the new 8ch
posts.body:
>OG 8chan has not returned in 3 days.
>8chan is being investigated by police in Philipines
>Onion 8ch is slower than a traffic jam
>4chan is too cucked for free speech.
>Bunkerchan is for commies.
Embrace infamy, embrace your new chan.

>>635fbcfe-ee1d-4e35-acda-aaffe6f77160
Clone 8ch is better.
If it makes you feel better, Tor is running in the background and it actually syncs abit with Firefox. Tor Browser is better and isn't hard to configure but for noobs that are worried that they will be hunted by the feds because they used Tor you guys are good safe but you should definitely get in the hang of using Tor Browser to go on here.

>>9e80f0ea-871a-4c0f-907d-bc7999a33073
If you guys are worried about decentralizing cp getting noticed by your ISP tor is enabled by default you are safe but you should get the Tor Browser ASAP. I will do a tutorial on web security shortly.

>>c7ad430a-1e80-475d-b15d-79676bafa1ee
This
The board administrator needs to sticker this. Otherwise I'll probably create /b2/ and do a brief security tutorial.

posts.subject: How to be anonymous on clone 8chan & Zeronet
posts.body:
To make matters short, Zeronet is P2P like torrent/bitcoin. Tor is enabled by default so you get some anonymity but if you want the full anonymity you should download Tor Browser.

1. Download Tor
https://www.torproject.org/

2. Open it go to "Tools" then "Options"

3. Scroll down to the very bottom of the "Options" page you should see "Network Proxy" and next to it "settings" click on it.

3. On the "Connection Settings" page go to "No proxy for" and copy the follow: 127.0.0.1

4. Click okay, and your set. Copy the Zeronet address you were on and bookmark it in Tor.

And just like that your worries about joining the party van are gone. You can browse, download, mute or say whatever you want.

Tread well anons!
